trans-unit.source: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: 지시 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 에 없는 헤더에 대해 필수 처리를 사용 하지 않도록 설정 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>SOAP 1.1 및 1.2 사양에 따라 인식 되어야 하는 컬렉션.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>

trans-unit.source: By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 클라이언트 또는 서비스 런타임을 발견 한 경우 예외를 throw 한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>는 메시지에는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `true` 헤더에 속하지 않는 있지만 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메시지에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제를 방지 하려면는 MustUnderstandBehavior를 사용 하 고 설정 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>속성을 `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로이 시나리오에 사용 메시지 내용을 위치 헤더 블록이 릴레이 될 다른 위치 및 라우터 서비스 처럼 처리 하지는 않는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"> </xref> 클래스 지정된 된 값을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 전달 `false` 로 `validate` 예외가 런타임 발생 하면 throw 되지 않게 하려면이 생성자에 매개 변수는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>는 메시지에는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `true` 헤더에 속하지 않는 있지만 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메시지에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> headers.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사를 실행할지 여부를 지정 하는 값 <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> 헤더입니다.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 동작 기능을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 구현 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>동작 기능을 지원 하기 위해.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 동작이 적용 되는 끝점입니다.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters for the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 동작에 대 한 바인딩 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>동작 기능을 지원 하기 위해 메서드에.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 동작이 적용 되는 끝점입니다.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to set.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 클라이언트 런타임입니다.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>동작 기능을 지원 하기 위해.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 동작이 적용 되는 끝점입니다.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher to set.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 디스패처입니다.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 동작 기능을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>동작 기능을 지원 하기 위해 메서드에.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: 유효성을 검사할 끝점입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 및 1.2 사양에 따라는 헤더를 인식 확인 여부를 지정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: ValidateMustUnderstand 속성을 설정 `false` 런타임에서 발생 한 경우 throw 되 고에서 예외를 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>는 메시지에는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `true` 헤더에 속하지 않는 있지만 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메시지에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>헤더를 올바르게 처리 해야 하는 경우 오류가 throw 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
